snippet: Beautiful but vacuous, Roni Horn’s exhibition teeters on a divide between high-minded art and high-end design.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews works by Roni Horn at Hauser & Wirth New York gallery.
lead_paragraph: Beautiful but vacuous, Roni Horn’s exhibition teeters on a divide between high-minded art and high-end design.

headline.main: Roni Horn: ‘Everything was sleeping as if the universe were a mistake’
headline.print_headline: Roni Horn: ‘Everything was sleeping as if the universe were a mistake’
